short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter out dietary restrictions and preferences from online food-delivery menus. Currently supports UberEats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily disable or hide dietary restriction items from food-delivery menus. This searches the restaurant menu for items that match your selected dietary restriction, and either disables or completely hides them based on selected option. Currently supports UberEats but adding GrubHub, Postmates, and DoorDash next.
